text: Ra ‘‘sulaimanako’’ nimti hamile vayula'i basibhuta garidi'eka thiyaum. Yasako bihanako abhista eka mahinako bato hunthyo ra samjhako abhista pani (eka mahinako thiyo) ra hamile usako nimti pagleko tambako srota baga'idiyaum ra jinnaharumadhyebata pani kehila'i (usako basibhuta garidi'eka thiyaum). Jasale aphno palanakartako anujnale usako agadi kama gardathe. (Adesa thiyoh) ‘‘ki uniharumadhye jasale hamro adesako ullanghana gardacha usala'i hamile prajvalita agoko svada cakha'unechaum’’
